name: ZK Hack X EthereumCzech Meetup in Prague
short_description: Join us for a casual meetup with the ZK Hack and EthereumCzech communities. No talks, just good vibes and zk-chats!
description:
Whether you're a longstanding member of the ZK Hack community, of the EthereumCzech community, a cryptography expert or just curious about zero-knowledge technology, join us on Wednesday May 28th at 6:00PM in Prague!

This ZK Hack X EthereumCzech Meetup is an opportunity to meet fellow zk-enthusiasts and have a good time... There're no talks for the night, just good vibes!

We will be serving limited food and drinks. So remember to RSVP and come early before we run out!

This ZK Hack Meetup is produced in partnership with Self – huge thanks!

What to expect:

* 6:00 PM – Welcoming guests
  * Say hi, get a glass, make new friends
* Hanging-out
  * Featuring drinks, snacks & zk-chats
* 10:00 PM – End of the event
  * Very sad indeed, but dry your tears cause you can still find us & the whole ZK Hack community on Discord
* 10:00 PM ?
  * Well, the bar closes at 1AM, so... more drinks?

Meet our partners:

Self
Self is a privacy-preserving identity protocol that leverages zero-knowledge (ZK) proofs to prove users' identity and unique attributes without revealing personal data.
